N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.245 - Contractor employees

State Regulations
(a) With
respect to those covered employees who are contractors or employed by a
contractor, an operator may provide by contract that the alcohol testing, training and education required by this Part be carried out by the contractor
provided: (1)
the operator remains responsible
for ensuring that the requirements of this Part and 49 CFR part
40
are complied
with; and
(2)
the contractor allows
access to property and records by the operator, the administrator, any DOT
agency with regulatory authority over the operator or covered employee, and, if
the operator is subject to the jurisdiction of the department, a representative
of the department for the purposes of monitoring the operator's compliance with
the requirements of this Part and 49 CFR part
40. Notes
